mapper.insert: insert into t_acct_account_type (account_book_type, accttype, typename, cusentry, caentry) values (#{accountBookType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusentry,jdbcType=BIT}, #{caentry,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select account_book_type, accttype, typename, cusentry, caentry from t_acct_account_type
